                  throws DatabaseException,
                         ConnectionFailedException
        Updates the task of a project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project in which the task is updated
        taskToEdit - the task that is being updated
        newDescription - the new description of the task
        startDateHour - the start date and hour of the task in epoch milli format
        endDateHour - the end date and hour of the task in epoch milli format
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if an error occurs during the updating of the task
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
